content: old shale scarf by tiennie this is just a simple feather and fan stitch pattern otherwise known as old shale for the resemblance to waves upon the sand this stitch pattern is often used as a finishing edge on clothing items i knitted a scarf with this beautiful and silky fingering weight yarn in order to be able to enjoy the warmth and softness around my neck size 8 inches wide by 80 inches long but knit it to your desired length materials sundara yarn fingering silky merino in autumn rose us #6 needles 1 tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge pattern gauge is 27 sts = 4 inches since it is a scarf the gauge is completely up to your preference abbreviations co - cast on k - knit rs - right side yo - yarn over sts - stitches bobble - bind off p - purl ws - wrong side k2tog - knit 2 stitches together pattern co 54 sts row 1 rs knit row 2 ws purl row 3 rs * k2tog 3 times yo k1 6 times k2tog 3 times repeat from * row 4 ws knit repeat row 1 - 4 when you achieve desired length of scarf end pattern on row #4 next row bobble all stitches loosely weave in any ends and block as desired copyright 2008 by tiennie for tiennie knits at http //tiennie com this pattern is for private use only the pattern images or products made from the pattern may not be sold without the express written consent of the designer if you have any questions or find any errors please contact me at tiennieknits@comcast net thanks page 1 of 1
